dict.acceptation: 合理的，公道的；明白道理的；适当的；有理性的；

sent.orig: A reasonable man is reasonable. A rational man is never reasonable.
sent.trans: 一个合理的人是合理的，一个理性的人是从来都不合理的。

sent.orig: Determination reasonable transmission route, through computation parts and so on choice reasonable electrical machinery, speed reducer.
sent.trans: 确定合理的传动路线，通过计算选择合理的电机、减速机等部件。

sent.orig: She said the United States knows are reasonable reasonable security concerns about the service, but.
sent.trans: 她说，美国了解在黑莓服务方面存在合理的安全性担忧。

sent.orig: I want to argue that it is reasonable to believe in God.
sent.trans: 我坚持认为，信仰上帝是合情合理的。

sent.orig: Products in the grocery are sold at reasonable price.
sent.trans: 这间杂货店的产品价格公道。
